txt.en: The Orc-attack upon the Rohirrim-camp is now imminent, but preparations will hopefully help this small group of hunters and fishermen survive the assault.

'Wynmar does not even stir! We must prepare now, with or without his say. He will stir enough when Orc-swords run him through.\n\n'There is much to do...barricades to reinforce, and swords and spears to sharpen. We will be lucky to survive the night, even if we can manage to prepare....'
Swords, spears, and barricades can be found around Wynmar's southern camp.\n\nYou should help the men of Stangard prepare for the imminent attack.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. With you here, I have hope...even with Wynmar in his bewitched state. And now we wait.'
Rothulf is at Wynmar's camp in the south of Thinglad.\n\nYou should tell Rothulf that you have assisted with preparations for the imminent Orc-attack.
'The Orc-attack is imminent. We must do what we can!'
